article_title: Friends of Abingdon continue protest of proposed development
article_text:
Highlands Vasectomy Clinic

Welcome to Highlands Vasectomy Clinic where our only goal is to assist families in East Tennessee and South West Virginia with the most pain-free, cost-effective, and effective long-term birth control available. Vasectomies are ALL WE DO and the real life needs and schedules of our patients are our first priority. We offer evening and Saturday morning appointments. Dr. Greg Griffith and staff are here for your vasectomy needs. Dr. Griffith has provided general Urological care to East Tennessee and South West Virginia for nearly 20 years. He is now focusing entirely on the same populations vasectomy needs and will be the regions ONLY provider of the “No Needle” vasectomy. We are offering the standard “no scalpel” vasectomy and adding the “no needle” option, making this minor procedure nearly PAINLESS.

og.description: ABINGDON, Va. – The Friends of Abingdon on Friday took to busy Cummings Street again in opposition to the possible rezoning of 33 acres near the Virginia Creeper Trail for a Food City development.
